casebody.data:
May 14, 1962.*

No. —.

Carbo v. United States. Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the consideration or decision of this application. William B. Beime, A. L. Wirin and Fred Okrand for petitioner.

Mr. Justice FranKfurter took no part in the consideration or decision of cases in which orders were this day announced.

The application for review of the order of the Circuit Justice denying bail pending appeal is denied.
